name: Islands of War(outdated)
description:
NOTE: This game is 2 years old. There is a newer version available here: IIslands of War.

You are the builder of an island. But this is not just any island you are building, its a floating island. Start with a few resources and battle foes for more till you become the champion of the skies.

Islands of War is a simple game, where your goal is to build and destroy floating islands. You will need to strategically build your island so that you keep your island in the sky and your enemies in a heap of rubble. Battle for more rewards and more glory.
